short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that helps you stay focused by blocking social media sites during the set timers, ensuring uninterrupted productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Media Blocker is a productivity-focused browser extension designed to help you reduce distractions and stay on task. With this tool, you can block access to popular social media websites during specified hours or for a set timer duration. Features include:

Customizable Block Schedule: Define start and end times to automatically block selected social media platforms.
Timer Functionality: Activate a countdown timer to enforce focused work periods. While the timer is active, the settings cannot be edited, ensuring uninterrupted productivity.
User-Friendly Interface: Easily select the websites to block and manage your preferences through a clean and intuitive popup menu.
Persistent Blocking: Even if the popup is closed, the timer and blocking functionality remain active in the background.
Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone aiming to improve focus and reduce unnecessary online distractions. Start reclaiming your time with Social Media Blocker!
